title: Handle Tenant Move-Out and Security Deposit
description: A tenant is moving out, and the property manager must inspect the unit and process the security deposit return.

tasks.description: Conduct a move-out inspection of the property, documenting any damages beyond normal wear and tear with photos.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed move-out inspection report is completed.

tasks.description: Obtain cost estimates for repairing the documented damages.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets quotes from vendors for the necessary repairs.

tasks.description: Calculate the amount of the security deposit to be returned, deducting for damages, and send the final accounting and any refund to the former tenant within the legally required timeframe.
tasks.expected_outcome: The security deposit is reconciled and returned according to state law.
